question: its Azee here i would like to know any good dua to recite, while at work
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Recite the following, ?Laa ilaaha illallaahu wahdahoo, laa shareeka lahoo. Lahul mulk wa lahul hamd, yuh-yee wa yumeetu, wa huwa alaa kulli shay-in qadeer.?

Also, lower your gaze and if your gaze falls on a woman, turn it and make Istighfaar.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
